channel.title: Instant Anatomy
channel.description: Podcasts to help the learning of human anatomy for doctors, medical students, nurses and anyone else who has an interest in human anatomy by Dr Robert Whitaker, Cambridge, UK
channel.itunes:author: Dr Robert Whitaker
channel.itunes:summary: Podcasts to help the learning of human anatomy for doctors, medical students, nurses and anyone else who has an interest in human anatomy by Dr Robert Whitaker, Cambridge, UK
channel.itunes:keywords: anatomy, medical, education, nursing, doctor, lecture, medicine, whitaker
